actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A joint resolution establishing a moratorium on the prepayment of certain mortgages insured under the National Housing Act or assisted under such Act.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development from accepting prepayments of certain mortgages insured or assisted under the National Housing Act prior to January 1, 1989.

titles.title: A joint resolution establishing a moratorium on the prepayment of certain mortgages insured under the National Housing Act or assisted under such Act.
